text: Delia Fiallo (4 July 1924 â€“ 29 June 2021) was a Cuban author and screenwriter. She was known for writing many romance novel. She was nicknamed the "mother of the Latin American telenovela". Fiallo died on 29 June 2021 at the age of 96, at her home in Coral Gables, Florida. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cuban screenwriters Category:Writers from Havana
title: Delia Fiallo
